rukus.text: 88|1|Attoteki (jitai no) shosoku ga, anata ni tasshita ka.
88|2|(Aru mono no) kao wa sonohi unadare,
88|3|honeori tsukare kitte,
88|4|moesakaru goku hi de yaka re,
88|5|nietagiru sensui o nomasa reru.
88|6|Kare-ra ni wa nigai ibara no soto ni, shokumotsu wa naku,
88|7|soreha eiyo ni mo narazu, ue mo iyasenai.
88|8|(Soto no aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kanki shi,
88|9|kare-ra wa doryoku shite kokoro michi tari,
88|10|takai rakuen no naka ni 置Ri,
88|11|sokode, munashi (kotoba) o kikanai.
88|12|Soko ni wa, nagareru izumi ga ari,
88|13|takaku age rareta (ikai no) nedoko ga ari,
88|14|taihai ga sonae rare,
88|15|shitone wa suretsu ni narabe rare,
88|16|shikimono ga shikitsume rarete iru.
88|17|Kare-ra wa 骼駝 Ni tsuite, ikaga ni tsukura reta ka o kangaete minai no ka.
88|18|Mata ten ni tsuite, ikaga ni takaku kakage rareta ka,
88|19|mata yamayama ni tsuite, ikaga ni suetsuke rarete iru ka,
88|20|mata daichi ni tsuite, ikaga ni hiroge rarete iru ka o.
88|21|Dakara anata wa kunkai shi nasai. Hontoni anata wa hitori no kunkai-sha nihokanaranai.
88|22|Kare-ra no tame no, shihai-shade wanai.
88|23|Daga dare demo, somuki satte shinko o kyohi surunaraba,
88|24|arra wa saidai no chobatsu de kare-ra o bassa reru.
88|25|Hontoni ware no moto ni, kare-ra wa kaeri kuru nodearu.
88|26|Kare-ra no seisan wa, hontoni ware no nindearu.
